channel.title: Simple Recipes
channel.description: A no ads, no nonsense simple cooking website featuring recipes everyone can make.

item.title: November 24th 2024
item.description: Implemented some minor improvements and fixes for the website. All external links now open in a new browser window. Adding to this, also changed the 88x31 button's code that was meant for embedding so that when a user clicks on it, it opens the link in a new window as well.

item.title: November 20th 2024
item.description: This website was created on November 20th, 2024, hurray! It's built purely with HTML and CSS and with the help of HUGO website generator. Happy cooking and website making everyone!!!
